Regulation Name(s): Immunoglobulins A, G, M, D, and E immunological test system
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Optilite Hevylite IgG Kappa and Lambda Kits, quantitative serum immunoassays for monitoring previously diagnosed IgG multiple myeloma using turbidimetry on the Optilite analyser.
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative in vitro assays for measuring IgG Kappa and IgG Lambda in serum to calculate the IgG Kappa/IgG Lambda ratio for monitoring previously diagnosed IgG multiple myeloma patients, used in conjunction with other laboratory tests and clinical evaluations.
